site_name: Rear Of 116 - 118 Askew RoadLondonW12 9BL
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation to Section 106 agreement for planning permission ref: 1996/00428/FUL granted 19th August 1996, request to amend the wording of agreement under clause 5.1.3 to read as follows: 'With the exception of the land identified in red in drawing reference 1448 SLP01 following Commencement of Development until the end of the Period not to sell transfer lease or otherwise dispose of the Site or any part of the Site other than to a Housing Association or by way of individual lettings to Housing Association Tenants renting under assured tenancies or such other form(s) of periodic tenancies as are permitted by the Housing Association or in the event of Housing Associations ceasing to exist as legal entities such other similar body as shall be first agreed by the Council such agreement not to be reasonably withheld or delayed PROVIDED THAT if the freehold or leasehold to the Site or any part of the Site is or becomes vested in a Housing Association and the Housing Association grants a mortgage or financial charge over the Site or any part of the Site to a building society bank insurance company or other bona fide financial institution and if such mortgagee or chargee seeks to dispose of the Site or any part of the Site pursuant to its power of sale following a bona fide default of the terms of such mortgage or financial charge by the Housing Association such mortgagee or chargee shall be free from all provisions of the Agreement as will any subsequent purchaser from the said mortgagee or chargee', deletion of clause 5.1.4 and removal of drawing no. 1865-S21 from the S106 agreement relating to car parking spaces.
